boardgame.name: D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D Miniatures
Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons Miniatures
龍與地下城戰棋
boardgame.description: This game is sold as Entry Packs and Expansions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Starter Set gives new players everything they need to play fast skirmish battles. They get 12 pre-painted miniatures, a stat card for each miniature, two double-sided battle maps, a 20-sided die (d20), damage counters, Quick-Start Rules, Advanced Rules, and a spell effect template. Special hints for beginners gets them playing quickly._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It allows three different ways to play:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1. Play using the competitive D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;D skirmish rules in the Entry Pack._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2. Represent characters and monsters in the D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;D roleplaying game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;3. Collection for D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;D Fantasy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The skirmish rules allow players to compete in a war bands fight. Winner is the player whose war band eliminates enemy creatures equal to its own cost. There are also various other victory conditions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons Miniatures Handbook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons Fantastic Locations: Fane of the Drow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons Fantastic Locations: Hellspike Prison_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons Fantastic Locations: Dragondown Grotto_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons Fantastic Locations: The Frostfell Rift_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons Fantastic Locations: City of Peril_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Eighteen (18) unopened Blood War booster packs I ship at-cost and combine multiple purchases. Note: I can only accept PayPal if it is NOT funded by a credit/debit card.

This listing is for user mcross only. Dragoneye Blue Wyrmling U $3.00 Small White Dragon (very young) U $4.00 Deathknell Wood Woad U $0.75 Celestial Dire Badger C $0.75 Angelfire Celestial Pegasus R $5.50 Large Copper Dragon R $6.50 Mounted Paladin R $12.00 Steel Predator R $4.00 Weretiger U $1.00 Giants of Legend Bronze Wyrmling U $1.50 War of the Dragon Queen Blackguard on Nightmare (Epic) R $5.00 Greenspawn Razorfiend U $1.00 Small Copper Dragon U $2.50 Wizened Watcher R $5.00 Unhallowed Complete Uncommon Set (23U) $25.00 Desert of Desolation Farmer C $1.00 Flame Snake C $.75 Large Fire Elemental U $4.50 Shadow Mastiff U $2.00 Thundertusk Boar U $2.00 Visejaw Crocodile U $2.00 Warhorse U $2.00 Shipping 2lbs. from 15229 to 03865 via USPS Priority is $6.20.

Acceptable to Good condition. This is the original edition of this game. The box is a little beat-up, but still solid. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s missing one figure (Orc Mauler) and the one 20-sided dice (but you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve already got one of those, right?). The base for the (impressive) Large Bronze Dragon is slightly warped, but still works fine. Otherwise, this game includes everything you and a friend need to play head-to-head D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D battles. Includes the following 11 figures: Halfling Slinger, Hobgoblin Archer, Horde Zombie, Large Bronze Dragon (did I mention this is an impressive figure?), Lion of Talisid, Mephling Pyromancer, Shieldwall Soldier, Skeletal Legionnaire, Troglodyte Thug, Warforged Bodyguard, Wood Elf Ranger.
Note: This listing for Cardboard Carnage only. For the 230 Mini_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Including a Huge Gold Dragon.
For mhutton ONLY! Garg Blue Dragon.

I have a bunch of Blood War singles. Each of them are still new, sealed in their plastic baggies. The cards are included and in mint condition. Epic cards are included for the Pit Fiend and Horned Devil. The price of this listing buys all of them (at 10% off). The prices for the individual minis are shown below. If you would like specific ones, send me a GeekMail, and I will post a customized listing for you. Shipping via USPS or FedEx Ground. It should be a cheap First Class parcel might work for minis. Blood of Vol Cultist $1 Celestial Giant Stag Beetle $2 Free League Ranger $1 Hero of Valhalla $1 Horned Devil $25 Karasite Fighter $2 Kobold Monk $1 Pit Fiend $20 Shadow Dancer $2
For Nich ONLY. Auction win for lot of tiles.
